casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Stephen J. WILLIAMS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Stephen J. Williams, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Philip Miller, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39793) is denied.

McDONALD, D'AURIA and MULLINS, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
